name: Media Scoring
description: Scoring template for Media super-sector patents. Includes codec efficiency and media standard relevance metrics.

questions.question: Rate the compression efficiency or quality improvements this technology offers. Consider bitrate reduction, perceptual quality, encoding/decoding complexity.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe compression gains and quality/efficiency tradeoffs.

questions.question: How relevant is this to media standards (HEVC/H.265, VVC/H.266, AV1, JPEG XL, AAC, etc.)? Consider standard essentiality potential.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify relevant media standards and degree of alignment.

questions.question: How does this patent improve media processing (encoding, decoding, transcoding, streaming, rendering)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe processing improvements and use cases.
